com.bws.jdistil.core.servlet.http
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          com.bws.jdistil.core.servlet.http.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class Controller
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

Default servlet class defining the default processing logic used to invoke business objects based on servlet actions contained in submitted requests.

Author:
- Bryan Snipes
See Also:
Serialized Form
